ygData.subject: Re: Weapon prices and locations
ygData.msgSnippet: Barbed Leather Whip is from Najena, not Befallen.  And ya, 20 is a bit to low, good group of mid to high 20s is good.  Barbed whips are rather rare, but I have
ygData.messageBody:
Barbed Leather Whip is from Najena, not Befallen. And ya, 20 is a bit to low, good group of mid to high 20s is good. Barbed whips are rather rare, but I have seen a couple people selling them, in the 50pp range, but neither of these people were in Najena when they were selling them.

>>> CAB <Bash@...> 5.17.99 11:04:51 AM >>>
From: CAB <Bash@...>

Barb Warrior looking up at 20th from close range, looking to upgrade
dualign weapons. Got a pair of mino axes, which are nice, but heavy and
slow. Seen the stats on the Barbed Leather Whip and it looks perfect.
I know it's from befallen, but most likely in an area I can not get to.
Is it possible to find these weapons for sale inside this zone by higher
levels just selling off there loot for weight? If so what is a fair
price for one? Also what are some other good dualing weapons? heard of a
crystaline sword that sounds just sweet, but no idea where that one
comes from.

Bashlor the Big Dumb Barb Warrior of Bertox
